app.title: Yo-kaidle
app.subtitle: A Yo-kai Watch wordle game.
app.description: Wordle inspired by the Yo-kai Watch franchise. Show your knowledge about Yo-kai and complete your Medallium!

gameRules.title: Game Rules
rules: Guess the daily Yo-kai in 6 attempts or less.
Each attempt must be a valid Yo-kai from the series.
After each attempt, you'll receive clues about the Yo-kai's characteristics:

colorExplanations.higher: Yellow with ‚Üë: The target Yo-kai's rank is higher
colorExplanations.lower: Yellow with ‚Üì: The target Yo-kai's rank is lower

clarifications.title: Important clarifications:
items: The game section refers to the game where the Yo-kai debuted as obtainable.
Yo-kai use characteristics from the first game they appear in. (Except Sangokushi ones, which adapt to 3)
The obtainable version of bosses is not taken into account and bosses without an official rank are Rank S.
The game is still in development and may contain errors. You can report them on discord.
